    • getInstaBreak

      public boolean getInstaBreak()
      返回块是否可能在小于计算的时间内被破坏。通常创造玩家是true。

      Returns whether the block may be broken in less than the amount of time calculated. This is usually true for creative players.

      Returns:
      the insta break
